org.openimaj.hardware.serial

Class RegExParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.hardware.serial.RegExParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SerialDataParser

    public class RegExParser
extends Object
implements SerialDataParser
    Takes incoming data from a serial parser and splits it into multiple strings based on a regular expression.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • getLeftOverString

        public String getLeftOverString()
        This function must return the data that was left-over from the previous parse, if at all. May return null.
        Specified by:
